title: Should I Buy an RV? (Hour 1)
description:
Take our Audience Survey & Enter to Win a $500 Visa Gift Card: Click here to take the survey

Ken Coleman & Dr. John Delony discuss:

Dealing with scammers,

A travel nurse considering buying an RV,

Unhealthy work environments,

Quitting a job to start a business.
